methods.name: upload
methods.description: Start uploading (same as clicking the upload button)
methods.description_zh: 开始上传（与单击上传按钮相同）

methods.name: abort
methods.description: Abort upload of all files (same as clicking the abort button)
methods.description_zh: 中止所有文件的上传（与单击中止按钮相同）

methods.name: reset
methods.description: Resets uploader to default; Empties queue, aborts current uploads
methods.description_zh: 将上传器重置为默认值;清空队列，中止当前上传

methods.name: removeUploadedFiles
methods.description: Removes already uploaded files from the list
methods.description_zh: 从列表中删除已上传的文件

methods.name: removeQueuedFiles
methods.description: Remove files that are waiting for upload to start (same as clicking the left clear button)
methods.description_zh: 删除等待上传开始的文件（与单击左清除按钮相同）

methods.name: removeFile
methods.description: Remove specified file from the queue
methods.description_zh: 从队列中删除指定文件

methods.name: updateFileStatus
methods.description: Update the status of a file
methods.params: (file: File, status: String, uploadedSize: Number) => void

methods.name: isAlive
methods.description: Is the component alive (activated but not unmounted); Useful to determine if you still need to compute anything going further
methods.description_zh: 组件是否处于活动状态（已激活但未卸载）;有助于确定是否仍需要进一步计算任何内容

methods.name: pickFiles
methods.description: Trigger the file picker dialog; The event must come from a user interaction event handler
methods.description_zh: 触发文件选取器对话框;该事件必须来自用户交互事件处理程序

methods.name: addFiles
methods.description: Manually add files to the queue
methods.description_zh: 手动将文件添加到队列

events.name: added
events.description: Emitted when files are added into the list
events.description_zh: 将文件添加到列表中时发出

events.name: removed
events.description: Emitted when files are removed from the list
events.description_zh: 从列表中删除文件时发出

events.name: finish
events.description: Finished working (regardless of success or fail)
events.description_zh: 完成工作（无论成功或失败）

color.description: Color name for component from the Quasar Color Palette
color.desc: Color name for bottom-side background from the Quasar Color Palette
color.description_zh: 类星体调色板中组件的颜色名称

no-thumbnails.description: Don't display thumbnails for image files
no-thumbnails.description_zh: 不显示图像文件的缩略图
